entry.title: Monstercat Silk Showcase 643 (Earth Day Special | Hosted by Vintage & Morelli)
entry.content:
Follow Monstercat Silk on all platforms - monster.cat/silk
Join us this week for a special Earth Day special of Monstercat's Silk Showcase as we premiere an exclusive live dj set with Vintage & Morelli & ThoughtForFood from the desert of Dubai! Celebrating Earth Day and encouraging conversations surrounding our climate!
Earth Day Speakers (Order of Appearance) Christine Gould (Thought For Food)

entry.title: Monstercat Silk Showcase 600 (Various Hosts | Special Guest: BT)
entry.content:
Featuring 4+ hours of melodic progressive house & trance highlights from Silk’s catalog (2008-2021), the milestone 600th episode of our weekly Monstercat Silk Showcase radio show & podcast is here! The show is co-hosted by Monstercat Silk Label Director Jacob Henry, as well as resident artists Sundriver, Terry Da Libra, Jayeson Andel, Vintage & Morelli, A.M.R, and Tom Fall. It is our extraordinary privilege to welcome BT, one of Silk’s biggest musical inspirations, as our featured guest. Celebrate with us, as we travel back to 2008 (when Silk was born) and share highlights from our catalog…through the present day.
Tracklist monster.cat/MSS600
Thank you for listening to Monstercat Silk Showcase! Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

entry.title: Silk Music Showcase 581 (Jacob Henry Mix – “One Step Forward” Edition)
entry.content: Beginning February 17th, Monstercat Silk Showcase will be our weekly radio show & podcast, featuring emotive and intelligent house, progressive, trance, & chillout. The show will pick up where Silk Music Showcase left off, so the “first” episode of Monstercat Silk Showcase will be episode 582. Label Director Jacob Henry and residents Tom Fall, Jayeson Andel, Terry Da Libra, Vintage & Morelli, A.M.R, and Sundriver co-host the show. We invite you to experience each new episode of our show every Wednesday at 2pm PT on Monstercat’s Twitch, as well as all podcasting apps and major streaming services, starting February 17, 2021. Tracklist: 1. Direct – One Step Forward [Monstercat] [00:00] 2. Forty Cats – From The North [Monstercat] [03:36] 3. entry.title: Silk Music Showcase 560 (A.M.R Mix)
entry.content: It is our great joy to announce the release of A.M.R’s debut artist album, “A Place For Everything,” out now. A pure and poignant journey from start to finish, this album is a reflection of A.M.R’s extraordinary artistic gifts, not to mention his own sensitivity and sincerity, as a human being. Click here to download/stream the album. Tracklist: 1. Odsen – Onism [Silk Music] [0:00] 2. Moya (US) – Efflorescence (djimboh Remix) [Organic Culture Recordings] [3:58] 3. entry.title: Silk Music Showcase 556 (A.M.R Mix – “A Place For Everything” Edition)
entry.content: Silk Music Family, it is our great joy to announce the release of A.M.R’s debut artist album, “A Place For Everything,” out today. A pure and poignant journey from start to finish, this album is a reflection of A.M.R’s extraordinary artistic gifts, not to mention his own sensitivity and sincerity, as a human being. Click here to download/stream the album. Tracklist: 1. entry.title: Silk Music Showcase 520 (Jacob Henry Mix – “Dusk” Edition)
entry.content: In celebration of Approaching Black’s brand new “Dusk” artist album on Silk Music (a two-part, 25-track offering), Label Director Jacob Henry presents the latest installment of Silk Music Showcase. Click here to download / stream “Dusk” on all major digital platforms. You can catch Jacob’s next live set at “Progress w/ Silk Music” at Club Contour, Seattle, on January 17.
